News.Title: SPP Polymer Signs MOU with Uttar Pradesh Government for 50 Crore Investment
News.Summary: SPP Polymer has entered into a Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) with the Government of Uttar Pradesh. The company plans to invest approximately 50 crore rupees in a new project, which is expected to commence within the next 6 months. SPP Polymer is an SME with a current market capitalization of 50 crore rupees.
